item.title: Creating Custom Fallback Navigation
item.description: When creating WordPress themes, sometimes it’s necessary to create your own menus. With 3.0+ you are able to create menus as well as a fallback menu. Within the fallback_cb, you can actually call your own functions to create a customized menu (helpful when developing for network of blogs). Here’s what you’ll need to do. 1. Activate Custom Menus How to Add Custom Navigation Menus in WordPress 3.0 Themes 2. Place your Menu in the Template Ex:
